short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for clearning analytics-related cookies and specifying a forwarded IP address for GeoIP lookups

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sitecore Analytics Testing Tools Chrome extension provides Sitecore Marketers and Developers with the ability to "spoof" their IP address. This is useful for testing features that rely on the visitor's GeoIP location, such as Personalization. Additionally, the extension provides the ability to clear Sitecore-specific cookies. By clicking "New Contact", Sitecore treats you as a first time visitor, whereas, clicking "New Visit" clears your current session and is the equivalent to a repeat visit.
